title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4205.8 - Emergency permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4205.8 - Emergency permit

State Regulations

In an emergency, the steward may permit owners, trainers, assistant trainers and jockeys to start, train or ride pending action on their
applications. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4205.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
